big-numbers.title: Big Numbers
big-numbers.subtitle: My strategy for introducing students to mathematical operators with Python code.
big-numbers.description: A short exercise for students in a coding class, to help them appreciate a computer's ability to work with huge numbers.

halting-problem.title: The Halting Problem
halting-problem.subtitle: An code-based explanation for those studying computability theory.
halting-problem.description: Can you make a program that determines if another program will run forever or terminate?
